entity.name: Abby Phillip
entity.description: American journalist and White House correspondent

text: @abbydphillip @DJJudd Ah that's good news.  Let the immunity continue to grow stronger.  Before you know it,   we'll be looking at COVID-19 in our rear view mirror.  I've yet to have any friends or family test positive.  I haven't missed a day's work since it all began.  Nor church services.
